title: New Feature: Offline Learning Mode
description: Download courses for offline access and continue learning anywhere, anytime.

content.data:
We are thrilled to announce our new Offline Learning Mode! Now you can download course content and continue learning even without an internet connection.

Key Features:

• Download entire courses or individual lessons
• Sync progress when back online
• Works on mobile and desktop
• Automatic updates when connected
• No additional cost for offline access

Perfect for:
• Commuting and travel
• Areas with poor internet
• Focused learning sessions
• International students

Start downloading your favorite courses today!

content.caption: Learn How to Use Offline Mode
